wikipedia_page.main: Major-General William John Vousden,  (20 September 1848 – 12 November 1902) was a Scottish officer in the Indian Army, and recipient of the Victoria Cross, the highest and most prestigious award for gallantry in the face of the enemy that can be awarded to British and Commonwealth forces.

response: * Colonel William John Vousden, , Indian Staff Corps, Colonel on the Staff, India.
